name: Who Am I...??
description:
Who Am I...! Is a fun and hilarious game for the whole family and you can play with all your friends!

From naming celebrities, to just for kids --
guess the word that’s on your head from the clues family and friend's give you before the time runs out!

Play one of the 18 exciting categories.

Features:
- Play with one friend, or one hundred at the same time.
- Draw a new card simply by tilting your phone.
- Keep videos of your hilarious game play for your own amusement, or share them right to Facebook.
- Diverse categories let you challenge your family, friends and entertain your kids for hours, all from one app!

With 18 exciting themed categories packed to the brim, the fun will never stop!

Categories include:
- Celebrities
- Movies
- Animals
- Countries
- Super Héros
- Characters
- Movies
- Animals
- Just for kids
- Movie Greats
- 2000's
- 90's
- 80's
- 70's
- Fictional Characters
- Non Fictional Characters
- Sport
- Sport Legends
- Super Stars
- Video Game
- And lots more!

Keep family and friends amused for hours.
